attributes.action: Force MPs to declare religion & Freemasonry membership
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the recent child abuse scandals we the public request MPs are forced to declare their religion and Freemasonry membership publicly, so we the British public can decide for ourselves who we vote for with full knowledge of where our MPs hold their allegiances.

We request the religion of MPs and Freemasonry membership be made available and clearly presented along side their names, contact work address and email without exception.

In order to stamp out corruption and political religious bias we believe it is of the utmost importance to declare this information for true democracy to have its day in British parliament debate.
